title: Rail lines (total route-km)
name: is.rrs.totl.km
readme: Rail lines are the length of railway route available for train service, irrespective of the number of parallel tracks.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Rail lines are the length of railway route available for train service, irrespective of the number of parallel tracks.
